Improvements.Improvement: Use Optional instead of null checks
Improvements.Description: In modern Java, it's recommended to use Optional instead of null checks. This can help to avoid NullPointerExceptions and makes the code more readable.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace the switch statement with a map of lambdas
Improvements.Change_Diff: This is a large change, so no diff is provided. However the idea is to replace the switch statement with a Map<AnotbAction, Function<..., CompactSketch<S>>> map and then use map.get(anotbAction).apply(...) to get the result.
Improvements.Description: The switch statement can be replaced by a map of lambdas to make the code more readable and maintainable. Each case in the switch statement corresponds to a lambda function in the map.
